name: Blobby The Wizard
description:
You play as a slime wizard who lost his spell books because of a storm. All your books were blown to the other side of the river, luckily the only spell you could remember is "spawn in a random object"! Use this to your advantage to reach the other side.

Hey there, this is my entry for the small game jam from Zeno. Did this all by myself in under 2 days, so didn't have the possibility to use all the time :c.  Had 0 time for UI so don't hate me. I also blame Unity colliders for any bugs lmao.

I hope you enjoy!
